body_html: Seems reasonable to add another alias so that dialated_conv2d == atrous_conv2d. You can add the alias into nn_ops.py like we do for other kinds of renames here: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/math_ops.py#L1212
body_text: Seems reasonable to add another alias so that dialated_conv2d == atrous_conv2d.  You can add the alias into nn_ops.py like we do for other kinds of renames here: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/math_ops.py#L1212
body: Seems reasonable to add another alias so that dialated_conv2d == atrous_conv2d.  You can add the alias into nn_ops.py like we do for other kinds of renames here: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/math_ops.py#L1212
